start_room.name: The Entrance
start_room.description: You stand at the entrance of an ancient dungeon. Torches flicker on the walls, casting long shadows.

hallway.name: Long Hallway
hallway.description: A long, dark hallway stretches before you. The air is damp and cold.

puzzle_room.name: Chamber of Riddles
puzzle_room.description: The walls are covered in ancient runes. A mysterious voice echoes in the room.

treasure_room.name: Treasure Room
treasure_room.description: A glittering room filled with gold and jewels! But something doesn't feel right...
